title: Women in the workforce: changes
creator_credit: Karin Altmann, Kent Chadwick and Victorian Film Corporation
brief_description: Shows the changing roles of women in the workforce, including individual cases of women undertaking careers which were once traditionally exclusively male, or male dominated. The women working in non-traditional jobs include a tram driver, an electrician, a gardener, a bank manager, a plumber, an explosives expert and a lead singer in a band.
